title: Interface Bridge Coverage Gap - CLOSED

semantic_context.objective: Close critical Interface Bridge coverage gap preventing access to runtime intelligence tools
semantic_context.methodology: AINLP architectural discovery and enhancement of Interface Bridge sequencer
achievements: Fixed path resolution to correctly locate runtime_intelligence/tools/
Restarted Interface Bridge server with isolated process management
Achieved 100% coverage of runtime intelligence tools via HTTP API
Validated tool execution through API endpoints

technical_implementation.sequencer_enhancement: Added runtime intelligence discovery to AIOSSequencer.discover_components()
technical_implementation.path_resolution_fix: Changed from relative CWD to absolute file-based path resolution
technical_implementation.server_isolation: Interface Bridge runs in detached background process (PID management)
technical_implementation.api_coverage: 38 runtime intelligence tools now accessible via HTTP API
technical_implementation.tool_execution: Validated execution of system_health_check and biological_architecture_monitor
